text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver

Product keywords:
Chrome/nickel plated for longer life
Industrial tool steel bits, heat treated, tempered, stress relieved, blast finished
Another quality Crescent product
One each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips; 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted; 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver included.

Product description:
text.Response A:
Our state-of-the-art Canon BP-718 compatible battery is designed and manufactured under strict European ISO 9001 standards. It meets and exceeds high priced OEM products, allowing you to power your camera/camcorder with a superior-quality battery for a fraction of the price! This includes two Compatible Digital Batteries and one Leatherette Camera/Lens Accessories Pouch (15x24 cm). Protective Retail Packaging, with each product wrapped with an inner plastic bag and outer box packaging. 

Compatibilities: Camera models: LEGRIA HF M506, LEGRIA HF M52, LEGRIA HF M56, LEGRIA HF R306, LEGRIA HF R36, LEGRIA HF R37, LEGRIA HF R38, VIXIA HF M50, VIXIA HF M500, VIXIA HF M52, VIXIA HF R30, VIXIA HF R300, VIXIA HF R32, VIXIA HF R40, VIXIA HF R400, VIXIA HF R42. Battery models: BP-709, BP709, BP-727 BP727 are also compatible and may have different capacities that would impact the size of the battery.

18 Months Manufacturer Warranty, Engineered and Manufactured Under European Standard ISO 9001. Guaranteed Superior Quality Meets or Exceeds High Priced OEM Products.
1600 mAh, 3.7 Volts, CE Approved, ROHS Compliant.
text.Response B: We all love Crescent products for their quality. Now try their latest product! Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver is chrome and nickel plated for longer life. The industrial tool steel bits are heat-treated, tempered, stress-relieved, and blast-finished. The screwdriver comes with one each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips, 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted,1/4- and 5/16-inch nut driver.

895.displayed_text:
Prompt

You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver

Product keywords:
Chrome/nickel plated for longer life
Industrial tool steel bits, heat treated, tempered, stress relieved, blast finished
Another quality Crescent product
One each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips; 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted; 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver included.

Product description:

Response A

Our state-of-the-art Canon BP-718 compatible battery is designed and manufactured under strict European ISO 9001 standards. It meets and exceeds high priced OEM products, allowing you to power your camera/camcorder with a superior-quality battery for a fraction of the price! This includes two Compatible Digital Batteries and one Leatherette Camera/Lens Accessories Pouch (15x24 cm). Protective Retail Packaging, with each product wrapped with an inner plastic bag and outer box packaging.

Compatibilities: Camera models: LEGRIA HF M506, LEGRIA HF M52, LEGRIA HF M56, LEGRIA HF R306, LEGRIA HF R36, LEGRIA HF R37, LEGRIA HF R38, VIXIA HF M50, VIXIA HF M500, VIXIA HF M52, VIXIA HF R30, VIXIA HF R300, VIXIA HF R32, VIXIA HF R40, VIXIA HF R400, VIXIA HF R42. Battery models: BP-709, BP709, BP-727 BP727 are also compatible and may have different capacities that would impact the size of the battery.

18 Months Manufacturer Warranty, Engineered and Manufactured Under European Standard ISO 9001. Guaranteed Superior Quality Meets or Exceeds High Priced OEM Products.
1600 mAh, 3.7 Volts, CE Approved, ROHS Compliant.

Response B

We all love Crescent products for their quality. Now try their latest product! Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver is chrome and nickel plated for longer life. The industrial tool steel bits are heat-treated, tempered, stress-relieved, and blast-finished. The screwdriver comes with one each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips, 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted,1/4- and 5/16-inch nut driver.
